name: (Spacemen, Strategists)^2
description:
"Why in the world are we still doing this...?"

Welcome back to the world of... WOIHI!! Our lovely criminal has escaped for the nth time and the team has gone after him again!! But this time, they have apparently brought their chief along? Could this time be something that requires drastic measures? Although, not sure what a tower could br--oh, the tower is empty.

Join the 4 lovely policemen in a daring battle to capture the criminal first!! Build levels on your own and then platform your way to the top first!! Not only are you able to sabotage your friends, but they can also team against you as well. Whoever wins the most points gets to claim all the glory!! ...for now.

Gameplay:

You can dish it out in a duel or turn it into a 4-player frenzy!! Controls for each player is mentioned in-game. Currently only supports keyboard.

The Team:

Cindy Vu - Game Director/Head Artist

Ramisha Wasim - Environmental Artist/Website Builder

Juan Callejas - Programmer/UI Artist

Kenny Su - Programmer/Audio

Alexandro Di Nunzio - Shader Artist/Particle System Developer

Shoutout to AYEL for composing the music for us!!
